I re-watched AUTUMN SONATA last night and it’s,without a doubt, a masterpiece. It definitely has one of my favorite screenplays of all time. The performances by Ingrid Bergman and Liv Ullmann are some of the best I've ever seen. It’s just perfect. https://t.co/Anm8hSf6gh
